alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Logan; McPherson; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 7:00PM CDT until May 29 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Logan County in west central Nebraska... Northeastern McPherson County in west central Nebraska... Western Blaine County in north central Nebraska... Thomas County in north central Nebraska... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 659 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Thedford to 17 miles north of Ringgold, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Thedford, Halsey, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River and Natwick. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 205 and 234. Highway 83 between mile markers 126 and 153. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
